text: Kirovo () is a rural locality (a selo) in Rassvetovsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 299 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 10 km from Davlekanovo, 10 km from Rassvet. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Kirovo, Republic of Bashkortostan
